headline: I don't understand laptop manufacturers back then

markdown.content: What's up with all of the instant on? Like who the fuck asked? I'm serious, just fucking educating users that they can hibernate their Windows XP/Vista. This is even worse than the laptops with Linux instant on ones

This is also why I am so frustrated with laptop equipped with HDD in the past, instead of educating users that "SSD ARE FUCKING FAST", PC manufactures instead advertise higher storage capacity, leading to so many people to think that Macs are way faster than Windows, it's not because MacOS is actually faster it's just Apple equipped Macs with SSD
